valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 25 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 26 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 1000 moving rather quickly northwards, expected 400 miles west of Rockall 966 by 1800 Thursday. High South Utsire 1034 dissipating
